about_the_game:
Dive into a unique and relaxing experience with Cozy Garden, a game that combines the best of resource management, strategy and pet collection, all at the bottom of your screen.

Cozy Garden allows you to manage your farm and take care of adorable creatures while doing your daily tasks. The game occupies the bottom of your screen allowing you to play while you browse the web, work, study, watch videos, and much more.

Take a break and just sit and relax watching your pets work and live in your little world!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

In Cozy Garden, your pets are more than just companions – they’re your partners in building and managing a thriving farm. Care for, feed, and play with your pets to keep them happy and healthy. Plus, you will be able to collect new creatures as you explore the game.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Manage your charming little farm and rely on your pets to handle the daily tasks. Expand your land to discover new areas, build a variety of structures to ensure your pets remain happy and healthy, and customize your farm to reflect your unique style. Plant crops, gather resources, and create the perfect environment for your pets to thrive. As you grow your farm, unlock new features, upgrades, and challenges that will keep you engaged. Shape your farm into a vibrant and lively place, where every pet has a role and every corner reflects your personal touch.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 @ 3.2 GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with DX9 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Help adorable creatures manage their farm and expand their family in a farming simulation that combines resource management and pet care. This cozy game runs at the bottom of your screen, providing a quick break that lets you stay productive.
